whyPartner.title: Why Partner with One Nexuz for Business Setup in Dubai?
whyPartner.description: Worried about rejections and wasted time? Our one-window setup gets you approved and market-ready

items.title: Start Without Setbacks
items.description: One wrong document or mismatched activity can delay your license for weeks. With One Nexuz, every step of your Dubai business setup is handled by experts, ensuring full compliance and smooth approvals — so you begin without stress or rejection

items.title: Be Market-Ready in Days
items.description: Why waste weeks on setup formalities? With One Nexuz, your business formation is fast-tracked in days — so you enter the market quicker, seize opportunities sooner, and stay ahead of competitors.

items.title: Save More with Full Transparency
items.description: Hidden fees drain resources and trust. Our all-inclusive Dubai company formation packages save you AED 5,000–10,000, with every cost clear upfront — so you keep control and confidence.

nexuzDifferent.title: Here’s What Makes One Nexuz Different
nexuzDifferent.description: Experience a seamless journey, One Nexuz handles every business need from setup to digital success.

uaeBusinessJourney.title: Cut the Red Tape, We Handle Every Step of Your ^UAE Business Journey^

items.title: Banking Without the Headaches
items.description: Tired of endless paperwork and rejections? We match you with the right UAE bank, prep every document, and secure your account fast — so you can focus on running your business, not chasing signatures. With our direct banking expertise, your account opens smoothly, giving you instant access to operations.

items.title: Stay Compliant, Stay Stress-Free
items.description: VAT rules in the UAE are complex and mistakes are costly. We simplify registration, manage filings, and keep your books penalty-free — protecting your business while you focus on growth. Our experts ensure you stay compliant, audit-ready, and never face avoidable penalties.

items.title: Workspace That Gets You Licensed
items.description: Need an address for your trade license? Our co-working and flexi-desk solutions are affordable, flexible, and license-ready — giving you legal compliance and a professional space to grow from day one. Perfect for startups or scaling businesses, without the cost of long leases.

items.title: Visas Made Simple, For You & Family
items.description: From investor visas to family sponsorship, we remove the stress of medicals, paperwork, and Emirates ID. You settle in with peace of mind — while we handle the entire visa journey. Our streamlined process ensures relocation is smooth, stress-free, and secure.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to set up a company in the UAE with One Nexuz?
items.answer: Most businesses are established within 5–7 working days, depending on license type and approvals. We streamline every step so you can focus on planning your launch, not chasing paperwork.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me open a UAE corporate bank account?
items.answer: Yes. We remove banking headaches by preparing every document, matching you with the right bank, and guiding you until approval — reducing rejection risks and unnecessary stress.

items.question: What corporate services do you provide after setup?
items.answer: From VAT registration and filing to license renewals and PRO services, we handle ongoing compliance so your business stays penalty-free and worry-free year after year.

items.question: Do you also support branding and digital growth?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our team builds brand identity, websites, and digital marketing campaigns that help your company stand out, attract clients, and grow in the competitive UAE market.

items.question: Do you assist with relocation and family visas?
items.answer: Yes. We make moving simple by handling residency visas, Emirates IDs, housing, and logistics — ensuring both you and your family settle in smoothly

homeOurClient.title: Hear It Straight From Our Clients
homeOurClient.description: Don’t just take our word for it — hear the results from our customers themselves.

items.quote: “Seamless, super clear, and no red tape. I was up and running in under a week! The One Nexuz team handled every step — from structuring my company to opening the bank account and getting visas sorted. For a tech startup like mine, speed and precision matter, and they absolutely delivered.”
items.role: Founder of an AI Startup in Abu Dhabi

items.quote: “I had no idea where to begin, but One Nexuz walked me through every step. They helped me choose the perfect Free Zone, secure an office in a great location, and even handled all the approvals and documentation. I’ve worked with consultants before — these guys are on another level.”
items.role: Owner of a Wellness & Lifestyle Brand

items.quote: “One Nexuz made what could’ve been a stressful and bureaucratic nightmare feel effortless. I launched my e-commerce business in Abu Dhabi Mainland without delays, hidden fees, or confusion. Their team was always responsive, and their process was crystal clear from day one.”
